metadata.title: CVE-2021-40906 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: CheckMK Raw Edition software (versions 1.5.0 to 1.6.0) does not sanitisethe input of a web service parameter that is in an unauthenticated zone.This Reflected XSS allows an attacker to open a backdoor on the device withHTML content and interpreted by the browser (such as JavaScript or otherclient-side scripts) or to steal the session cookies of a user who haspreviously authenticated via a man in the middle. Successful exploitationrequires access to the web service resource without authentication.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
